summary: AS I WAS DRIVING AROUND A CURVED STREET, MY STEERING WHEEL LOCKS ON ME.  I COULD NOT SWERVE AND TURN MY CAR TO FOLLOW THE CURVED STREET.  I COULD NOT MOVE THE WHEEL AT ALL.  MY CAR RAN INTO A TREE HEAD FIRST.  ALL THE AIRBAGS DEPLOYED AND SMOKE APPEARED.  MY ENTIRE CAR WAS TOTALED AND SMASHED IN THE FRONT.  SCARIEST THING BECAUSE I HAD NO CONTROL. THANK GOD, MY 1 YEAR OLD SON WAS NOT IN THE BACKSEAT OR ELSE HE WOULD HAVE BEEN FATALLY INJURED WITH THOSE AIRBAGS.  I NEED TO KNOW WHAT CAN BE DONE.  TOYOTA HAS HAD RECALLS IN THE PAST AND THIS COULD HAVE ENDED MY LIFE.  *TR
